summary: I HAVE A 2000 FORD EXPLORER SPORT WITH 24,040 MILES ON IT.  I AM SCHEDULED FOR A THIRD BREAK JOB ON THIS SUV.  I PERSONALLY THINK IT IS CRAZY THAT A VEHICLE WITH THAT LOW OF MILEAGE HAS THIS MANY PROBLEMS.  I AM TAKING THE CAR TO A PRIVATE MECHANIC TO HOPEFULLY REMEDY THE PROBLEM.  THE OTHER TWO SERVICES WERE PERFORMED BY FORD DEALERSHIPS.  *NLM
